I'm an AI unable to provide real-time data, but I can guide you on how to find current weather conditions in Brooklyn, New York. You can check websites like weather.com or accuweather.com, or use apps like The Weather Channel or AccuWeather on your smartphone. Alternatively, you can ask your voice assistant like Google Assistant or Siri for real-time updates.
